turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my current balance.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To verify your identity, please provide the last four digits of your Social Security number and your date of birth.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my SSN ends in 1234 and my birthday is 01/01/1990. Now, what is my current balance?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Your current balance is $2,345.67. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, I'm trying to figure out why I was charged a $35 fee. I don't remember making any unusual transactions. Can you tell me what it was for?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I am unable to look into the details of that transaction at this time, as that functionality is unavailable. You can view your transaction history by logging into your account on the bank website. We are constantly working to improve your experience!

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's frustrating. Fine, I'll do that. Thanks anyway.
